name: Biventricular Noncompaction Cardiomyopathy with Concomitant Ventricular Tachycardia
chief_complaint: I feel like my heart is racing and I can't catch my breath, especially when lying down.
prognosis: Guarded due to risk of sudden cardiac death; long-term survival depends on adherence to therapy and monitoring.
description: A rare form of cardiomyopathy characterized by excessive trabeculation of both ventricles, leading to impaired systolic function and arrhythmogenic substrate. The ventricular tachycardia originates from the noncompacted myocardium, creating re-entrant circuits.
multiple_choice: Biventricular Noncompaction Cardiomyopathy with Concomitant Ventricular Tachycardia
